definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: I'm not going to overenjoy it just because it might be my last.
sentences.chinese: 我不會因爲這是最後一個賽季就怡然自得。

sentences.english: One needs space to be oneself.
sentences.chinese: 人要有空間才能怡然自得。

sentences.english: She also delectated herself greatly in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 她一人在花園裏也很怡然自得。

sentences.english: Yet Mr Roh was also ill at ease with himself.
sentences.chinese: 而且盧武鉉自己真的也不太怡然自得。

sentences.english: His mood of contentment was beginning to lapse.
sentences.chinese: 他怡然自得的心情漸漸消失了。

sentences.english: Cattle, sheep and horses graze leisurely.
sentences.chinese: 牛羊駿馬在這裏怡然自得。

sentences.english: She will close the eyes comfortably, cozily.
sentences.chinese: 她會很舒服的閉上眼睛，怡然自得。

definition: to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
see 悠哉悠哉[you1 zai1 you1 zai1]
see 悠哉悠哉[you1 zai1 you1 zai1]
see 悠哉悠哉[you1 zai1 you1 zai1]
